## Real-Time Data Access

Click here to [Download](http://www.ssec.wisc.edu/datacenter/rtserver.html) the commands to update your ADDE client server table with the current real-time server information.

See the [McIDAS Users Guide](http://www.ssec.wisc.edu/mcidas/doc/) for help using ADDE

**Important:[](http://www.ssec.wisc.edu/datacenter/?page_id=53)**

[Meteosat Data Usage Restrictions](http://www.ssec.wisc.edu/datacenter/?page_id=53)
